tool.name: BRAT_project_tool

param.name: projPath
param.dialogReference: The path to a specific folder. This will be where the folder structure will be created.

param.name: projName
param.dialogReference: If you want the XML to have a project name, enter it here.

param.name: hucID
param.dialogReference: If you want your XML to include information on what HUC you’re running BRAT on, enter it here.

param.name: hucName
param.dialogReference: If you want the name of your watershed to be recorded in the XML, enter it here.

param.name: ex_veg
param.dialogReference: Add all landfire EVT layers that you want to use, making sure that the “VEG_CODE” field has been added and populated.

param.name: hist_veg
param.dialogReference: Add all landfire BPS layers that you want to use, making sure that the “VEG_CODE” field has been added and populated.

param.name: network
param.dialogReference: Add all stream networks that you want to use in BRAT.

param.name: dem
param.dialogReference: Add all DEMs that you want to use in BRAT.

param.name: landuse
param.dialogReference: Add all land use rasters that you want to use in your BRAT runs, making sure that the “LU_CODE” and “LUI_CLASS” fields have been added and populated. This input will be required for Step 6: Conservation and Restoration Model.

param.name: valley
param.dialogReference: Add all valley bottom polygons that you want to use in your BRAT runs. This input will be required for Step 6: Conservation and Restoration Model.

param.name: road
param.dialogReference: Add all road shapefiles that you want to use in your BRAT runs. If your area does have roads, this input will be required for Step 6: Conservation and Restoration Model

param.name: rr
param.dialogReference: Add all railroad shapefiles that you want to use in your BRAT runs.If your area does have railroads, this input will be required for Step 6: Conservation and Restoration Model.

param.name: canal
param.dialogReference: Add all canal shapefiles that you want to use in your BRAT runs. This input will be required for Step 6: Conservation and Restoration Model.

param.name: ownership
param.dialogReference: If you have land ownership shapefiles, add them here. These will be used in future steps to optionally segment the network by ownership, as well as add ownership attributes to streams.

param.name: beaver_dams
param.dialogReference: If you want to compare BRAT results to beaver dam survey data, add those files here. This input will be used for Step 7: Data Capture Validation

param.name: perennial_stream
param.dialogReference: If you want to use perennial streams for future tools, add them here.

tool.summary: Gathers inputs and creates folder structure for a BRAT project.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Gathers inputs and creates folder structure for a BRAT project.
